thread.title: Margarida Lucas
thread.title_full: LightInTheBox 的点评人 Margarida Lucas

author: Margarida Lucas
title: Margarida Lucas
text: I am happy for be part of this community, but i have some shippings that i d´ont known where they are. Too wasches for boy in qwartz and a back bag in leader for men. I hoppe that you ,by the consultation of the archives of the orders of the clients, get discover mi payements of the articles.If ,a day, i receive them, i will give you five stars.
